header.title: 'It's SEXIST!' Meghan Markle fans FURIOUS at article highlighting GREY HAIR
header.subtitle: MEGHAN Markle fans are outraged at an article in Marie Clarie about the Princess-to-be having a single strand of grey hair which Twitter users have slammed as sexist, disgusting and ridiculous  it has been revealed.
header.postText: 'The title of the original article reads: Meghan Markle Has a Single Grey Hair while the subhead adds: And it's magnificent.', 'The article was based on photos from Meghan Markle and Prince Harry’s recent visit to Catalyst Inc, a science park in Belfast, Northern Ireland on March 23.', 'Although the article was not written in a negative light, a number of Twitter users were furious the article was published in the first place.', 'The article read: Important news: Meghan Markle, human, has a grey hair. She revealed this truth when she left the house and it was, well, right there on her head.', 'It is glorious because, same.', 'The author of the article goes on to explain that she also has grey hairs, adding: Every few weeks I see a grey hair sprout up on my head, inevitably glinting proudly right on my part.', ' It seems like the colourless ones grow faster and more determinedly than my non - grey hairs, but that 's beside the point—every time I see one, I think what do I do with you?', 'But even though the article was not cast in a negative light, it sparked outrage online. ', 'One Twitter user wrote: Hopefully God will forgive Meghan Markle for committing the unpardonable sin of having a grey hair.', 'Thanks Marie Claire for confirming that I'm not missing anything other than everyday sexism by not buying your magazine.', 'Another said: Shame on Marie Claire for this nonsense about Meghan Markle and a grey hair.','One woman wrote: That 's disgusting in my opinion. Marie Claire as a women's magazine has to support women.It is totally normal to have grey hair.', 'Some users took to the social platform to joke about their own grey hair.', 'Another furious tweeter wrote: Seriously Marie Claire this is not what a strong confident modern woman wants to read about!', 'No wonder I stopped buying your magazine!I 've way more important things to worry about than another woman's grey hair!', 'One person said: So I guess Marie Claire posted an article about Meghan Markle's one grey hair., ' * Clicks on Twitter.Sees that Marie Claire has tweeted about Meghan Markle having ONE GREY HAIR.Closes Twitter again, thinking dark thoughts.*', 'I’m seven years younger than her and I've got a head full of them.NOBODY CARES.', 'One comment read: If Meghan Markle 's lone grey hair on her head is news, my grey pube is available for interview.', 'While another sarcastic user wrote: I can't believe Meghan Markle 's grey hair is single. IT'S A TOTAL CATCH!'
header.socioLingVar: Gender - General,Age - Over 65s,Ethnicity - General,Ethnicity - Black,Physical Identity - Physical Features, Ideological and Political Identity - General,Age - General,Nationality - American

commentThread.commentText: Well she's no spring chicken  !!!

We all know already that the woman is far too old to be a brood mare for Harry - starting much too late in life. She'll be what the medical profession term a "geriatric mother". It is all so unseemly!

Not sure why its sexist to say she has a grey hair, she clearly does.. however I'd prefer no news on this woman, shes no fit consort for a prince.. but seams harry is intent on going through with it, so prepare to pay their divorce bill.
Sexist? How?

replies.commentText: They mentioned an article that was not favourable on a woman... thats enough nowadays to be called sexist.

commentThread.commentText: total flakes. how pathetic people are nowadays, bet they had to have a little ly down after that very stressful experience.
And dropping career, family, friends and pets for man is not sexist? Really, anyone heard any news about her dog, the one she brought to UK, but who mysteriously broke his BOTH legs ?
If she has grey hairs she has grey hairs, that’s a fact. What’s sexist about it?
how much of this garbage have we got to put up with

replies.commentText: About 30 years then it will be the kids!
Miles to go.  Do you remember the decades of Diana worship? Well that was a minor photo-op in comparison.

commentThread.commentText: She does not deserve any fans. She is a brazen manipulative controlling American bent on taking it over the headlines of the monarchy for own selfish ends and degrading it in the process. Royal Family for allowing this? Pffff to you all.
The frizz beneath - so obvious from the close-up.
What complete and utter nonsense! What about all the articles and photos of Prince Charles and Prince William showing their bald patches? Get a grip, people!

replies.commentText: What about them? Is that not equality? ;

commentThread.commentText: Sexist !!! What a load of nonsense. It's a wonder they haven't been accused of being racist and anti-semitic and 'divorcee-ist' and anything else they can chuck at them

replies.commentText: You are here with your shattered feelings melting away into oblivion while calling other people a snowflake.... Then you accuse others of crying while having a meltdown!At least you are amusing.Even if its not on purpose.
do u want me to buy you some tissues ?
I doubt you need to buy any, your attic is probably already full of multipacks. Did you request a second wheelie bin from your council or do you just fly tip the discarded kleenex?
It is sexist because there would never have been a article about a man having one grey hair at the age of 36 . Therefore she is treated differently because she is a woman
Let’s get real!  At 36 I was enjoying life far too much to worry about a grey hair or silly sexist labels.
let get real with the real people . real real really boring

She is treated differently because she in marrying into the royal family. How much effort does it take to be offended on behalf of everyone else with false sexism and racism accusations? it must be exhausting. You should get a life and stop being a miserable snowflake feminist.
William had loads of articles when he started losing his hair, and still does. your sexist claim is ridiculous
(null)
insults and abuse rather than debate... standard. all i did was point out the obvious flaw in your thinking with reason and logic.
ridiculous !

commentThread.commentText: (null)

replies.commentText: i love watching you racist royalist

commentThread.commentText: Eeeewww! You know what they say about grey hair above and so below. Do you think Harry helps her dye it or someone else does it or Mizz Markle does it. Surely she wouldn't go out with grey hairs!
Why does the truth hurt
Looks to me like a stray p*bic hair that has lost its way.
There something a bit chavvy about markle. She would suit a lacoste tracksuit living on a council estate.
so what, i had grey hair when i was 16,wish some people would get a life
It's commented on, because she dyes her hair black and the hair stands out.
A pair of tweezers and a quick yank...there, so-called problem solved.

What rot and rubbish We ALL no matter who, get grey or white hair, WHEN WE GET OLDER. The Queen herself has grey hair. MM just does not wish to admit that she is getting middle aged.That 's why she acts in such a juvenile manner

replies.commentText: I hope you are not suggesting the Ginger should marry his granny because she has much more grey hair!
NO I AM NOT. I am stating that to have grey hair is a fact of life.

commentThread.commentText: We want to know why she doesn’t wear her hair in its natural state, it would mean so much to young black teens, why does she hide her natural afro. She could be such a role model for so many, disappointing

replies.commentText: Because maybe she thinks they look stupid?
I expect any children they have will sport ginger afros & will be left natural- so hang in there.

commentThread.commentText: DE is just as bad also for publishing the so called article.
(null)

replies.commentText: I am not a fan ,but you still dont speak for me.

commentThread.commentText: What is wrong with people . talking about a grey hair on a 36 year old woman's head . Absolutely pathetic.. Get a life people.
